snippet: Andreas Frege of Die Toten Hosen recounts his surprise at an apology from the German chancellor after her party used one of the band's songs in an election night celebration.
lead_paragraph: Andreas Frege of Die Toten Hosen recounts his surprise at an apology from the German chancellor after her party used one of the band's songs in an election night celebration.

headline.main: Merkel’s Call Befuddles a Punk Rocker
headline.print_headline: Merkel's Call Befuddles a Punk Rocker
